Html:
My post is similar to this one, but i still trying to solve that problem. 

When i run Tutorial 13 in stereo mode it crashes in Scene.UpdateTrackerAndImage() since it is trying to render right eye camera. This is supposed to crash since VR920 only has one camera. So here is the question - how do i stop it from rendering TWO video inputs, but keep the scene rendering in stereoscopic mode?

Note: My iTracker.ProductID is detected as IWR_PROD_NONE
